sources.title: All Tied Up (1993) with Teri Hatcher | Crime Movie | 1 man, 3 women and a very long rope
sources.description:
Brian Hartley’s quest for true love takes a hilariously twisted turn when his infidelity leads to a literal binding agreement with his heartbroken girlfriend, Linda, and her feisty roommates. As he desperately tries to untangle his mess of emotions while literally tied to the bed, he discovers that sometimes, letting go can be a knotty affair!— and painfully entertaining!

Original title: All Tied Up (1993)  
This film is available with Italian audio, and subtitles in many language options.

Director: John Mark Robinson
Writers: Robert Madero, Isabel Mulá, Laura Louden
Genres: Rom-Com, Comedy, Crime
Release date: July 30, 1993

Main Actors:
Zach Galligan - Brian Hartley
Teri Hatcher - Linda Alissio
Lara Harris - Kim Roach
Tracy Griffith - Sharon Stevens
Abel Folk - Max
Edward Blatchford - Detective Frank Steinham
Olivia Brown - Tara
Rachel Sweet - J.J.
Melora Walters - Bliss


00:00 Full Movie with subtitles
01:52 Brian Hartley surprises Linda Alissio with an engagement ring, hoping to solidify their relationship.
11:15 Linda catches Brian in bed with another woman, leading to their immediate breakup.
22:30 Determined to win Linda back, Brian sneaks into her house but is knocked unconscious.
33:45 Linda and her roommates, Kim and Sharon, tie Brian to a bed, initiating their unconventional re-education plan.
45:00 The women subject Brian to various humiliations, including dressing him in a skirt and feeding him only squash.
56:15 Brian misses an important job interview due to his captivity, jeopardizing his career.
1:07:30 Linda releases Brian, who then kidnaps her in a desperate attempt to prove his love.
1:24:00 After a series of comedic misadventures, Brian and Linda reconcile, agreeing to incorporate their experiences into their relationship.


@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Linda's boyfriend Brian loves checking out other women, so her best friends Kim and Sharon convince her that the three of them kidnap him and torture him until he learns his lesson.
metadata.Writer: Robert Madero, Isabel Mulá, Laura Louden (additional dialogue)
metadata.Actors: Zach Galligan, Teri Hatcher, Lara Harris, Tracy Griffith
